mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.username AS "username", a.sex AS "sex", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.age AS "age", a.home_address AS "homeAddress", a.link_phone AS "linkPhone", a.idcard_no AS "idcardNo", a.vaccine_name AS "vaccineName", a.standard AS "standard", a.batch AS "batch", a.inoculation_status AS "inoculationStatus", a.weight AS "weight", a.dosage AS "dosage", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.manufacturer AS "manufacturer", a.temp_id AS "tempId", a.open_id AS "openId", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.history AS "history", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.address AS "address", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.county AS "county", a.hepa_b_code AS "hepaBcode", a.antibodies AS "antibodies", a.vacctype AS "vaccType", a.realname AS "realname"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bs_hepatitis_bcheckin a
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.deflag='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bs_hepatitis_bcheckin( id, username, sex, birthday, age, home_address, link_phone, idcard_no, vaccine_name, standard, batch, inoculation_status, weight, dosage, create_date, create_by, manufacturer, temp_id, open_id, pay_status, history, remarks, address, province, city, county, hepa_b_code, antibodies, vacctype, realname, localcode ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{age}, #{homeAddress}, #{linkPhone}, #{idcardNo}, #{vaccineName}, #{standard}, #{batch}, #{inoculationStatus}, #{weight}, #{dosage}, sysdate, #{createBy.id}, #{manufacturer}, #{tempId}, #{openId}, #{payStatus}, #{history}, #{remarks}, #{address}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{hepaBcode}, #{antibodies}, #{vaccType}, #{realname}, #{localCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bs_hepatitis_bcheckin SET username = #{username}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, age = #{age}, home_address = #{homeAddress}, link_phone = #{linkPhone}, idcard_no = #{idcardNo}, vaccine_name = #{vaccineName}, standard = #{standard}, batch = #{batch}, inoculation_status = #{inoculationStatus}, weight = #{weight}, dosage = #{dosage}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, temp_id = #{tempId}, open_id = #{openId}, pay_status = #{payStatus}, history = #{history}, remarks = #{remarks}, address = #{address}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, county = #{county}, hepa_b_code = #{hepaBcode}, antibodies = #{antibodies}, vacctype = #{vaccType}, realname = #{realname} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BS_HEPATITIS_B_NUM b WHERE b.check_id = #{id} and b.deflag = '0' and b.localcode = #{localCode} ORDER BY b.vaccine_num
SELECT "NAME" FROM BS_MANAGE_VACCINE WHERE "ID" = #{vname}

SELECT DISTINCT V."ID", V."NAME", P.VACCINEID FROM VIEW_BS_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN BS_MANAGE_VACCINE v ON v."ID" = P .VACCINEID WHERE P.ISSHOW = 'Y' AND P.DEL_FLAG = '0' and p.localcode = #{localCode} and P.officecode = #{officeCode}
SELECT "COUNT"(*) FROM BS_HEPATITIS_BCHECKIN A WHERE a.hepa_b_code = #{hepaBcode} and a.localcode = #{localCode}

SELECT n.id AS "id", n.check_id AS "checkId", n.vaccine_num AS "vaccineNum", n.vaccine_date AS "vaccineDate", n.real_date AS "realDate", n.dose AS "dose", n.pay_status AS "payStatus", n.status AS "status", n.vaccine_id AS "vaccineId", n.manufacturer AS "manufacturer", n.batch AS "batch", n.n_status AS "nStatus", n.w_status AS "wStatus", n.create_name AS "createName", n.create_by AS "createBy.id", n.create_date AS "createDate", n.signature AS "signature", s.signature AS "signatureData", n.s_id AS "sId", s.stype AS "stype" FROM BS_HEPATITIS_B_NUM n LEFT JOIN BS_HEPATITIS_B_SIGNATURE s ON n.s_id = s.id WHERE n.check_id = #{id} AND n.vaccine_num != '0' and n.deflag = '0' AND n.localcode = #{localCode} ORDER BY n.vaccine_num

SELECT V."ID" AS vaccineId, V."NAME" AS vaccineName, P .MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer, P .BATCHNO AS batch, S."LABEL" AS "standard", P .STORENUM AS storeNum FROM VIEW_BS_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN BS_MANAGE_VACCINE v ON v."ID" = P .VACCINEID LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT s ON s."VALUE" = P."SPECIFICATION" AND s."TYPE" = 'specification' WHERE P .ISSHOW = 'Y' AND P .DEL_FLAG = '0' AND P .localcode = #{localCode} and P.officecode = #{officeCode} ORDER BY V."NAME"

select * from ( SELECT V ."ID" AS vaccineId, P ."ID" AS pid, P .BATCHNO AS batch, P .SPECIFICATION AS standard, P .MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer FROM VIEW_BS_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN BS_MANAGE_VACCINE v ON v."ID" = P .VACCINEID WHERE P.ISSHOW = 'Y' AND P.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND P.storenum > 0
AND P.VACCINEID LIKE '02' || '%' AND P.SPECIFICATION LIKE #{attr} || '%'
AND P.VACCINEID LIKE #{attr} || '%'
AND p.localcode = #{localCode} AND P.officecode = #{officeCode} ) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE BS_HEPATITIS_B_NUM SET pay = '0', pay_status = '1', create_date = sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
